cards.name: Expect the Unexpected
cards.text: After your opponent shuffles their discard pile into their deck during their turn, fulfill Expect the Unexpected.

cards.name: Forge Ahead With Confidence
cards.text: After your opponent forges a key during their turn, they resolve each fate effect under Forge Ahead With Confidence.

cards.name: The Cards Will Tell
cards.text: Each time your opponent draws a card, place a prophecy counter on this card. If there are 10 or more prophecy counters on The Cards Will Tell, they resolve each fate effect under The Cards Will Tell.

cards.name: Treat Each Action as Your Last
cards.text: After your opponent plays 2 or more action cards during their turn, they resolve each fate effect under Treat Each Action as Your Last.

cards.name: Parasitic Arachniod
cards.text:
Destroyed: An enemy creature captures 1 Aember icon from its own side.

Fate: A friendly creature captures 3 Aember icon from your side.
